author: Staff Reporter
text:
Stating that no action was taken against encroachers of his land, a labourer along with his family attempted to self-immolate outside the Collectorate premises here on Monday. Kanagaraj, of Thusur Kanavaipatti, was living in the 2.5 cent land provided by the government for the past 40 years. It is said that Karupan, Karnan and Chellamal encroached his land and fenced it. They allegedly threatened him to vacate the house. Kanagaraj had lodged complaint with the police many times, but no action was taken so far.

On Monday, Kanagaraj along with his wife and two children came to the Collectorate. In the entrance, he took out a can filled with kerosene and attempted to pour on self. Police acted swiftly and grabbed the can.
title: Suicide bid foiled
